= naive, naïve | BrE nʌɪˈiːv,nɑːˈiːv, AmE naɪˈiv | [[/wordsi|<-Back to List]] =

`朴素的/普通的`

adjective

① (credulous, lacking experience) 幼稚的 yòuzhì de ‹person, argument, remark›

▸ to be naive of sb to do sth;

某人做某事很幼稚

▸ in the naive hope/belief of doing sth

抱着做某事的幼稚希望/信念

② (innocent) 天真的 tiānzhēn de ‹person, expression, manner›

▸ to have a naive look

看上去天真无邪

③ Art 稚拙的 zhìzhuō de ‹painter, art›
